  • getKnownBusInstances(): Map<string, ProxyState>
    • Defined in src/proxy/message.proxy.api.ts:112

    Every time a child eventbus registers it's self with a parent, this list grows. Use it to find out who's talking.

    Returns Map<string, ProxyState>

    • Defined in src/proxy/message.proxy.api.ts:96

    • Defined in src/proxy/message.proxy.api.ts:117
